member.name: AudioClientProperties
member.summary: The AudioClientProperties structure is used to set the parameters that describe the properties of the client's audio stream.

member.name: AudioClientProperties.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the AudioClientProperties structure, in bytes.

member.name: AudioClientProperties.bIsOffload
member.summary: Boolean value to indicate whether or not the audio stream is hardware-offloaded.

member.name: AudioClientProperties.eCategory
member.summary: An enumeration that is used to specify the category of the audio stream.
